website_summaries.verdict: There's not a skin tone this face-shaping palette doesn't flatter.
pros: Six shades of cream and powder to create a work of art
Highlights have a finish that is shimmery rather than dewy
cons: Several customers report palette was damaged when it arrived

customer_reviews.title: Looks 100% authentic and the makeup itself looks so nice. Haven't swatched the contour yet but the highlight ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my product, came really well packaged, in two bubble wrapping bags for protection. Looks 100% authentic and the makeup itself looks so nice. Haven't swatched the contour yet but the highlight swatches have me excited to test it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived completely destroyed, no way I can give this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: jay s kruger

customer_reviews.title: good product, bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: The palette itself is great, the highlights are more of a glittery highlight than a dewy highlight. I docked two stars though because when I received it one of the highlight shades was cracked. It was relatively easy to fix with some rubbing alcohol but still annoying that they didn't take more care with shipping it.
customer_reviews.author: Clee

customer_reviews.title: Macy's Return Label Affixed to Palette
customer_reviews.text: The palette colors are perfect. I have a slight issue with the item being a previous return to a Macy's department store and there being a store return label affixed on the backside of the palette. I attempted to remove the Macy's label and what remains is a sticky surface. Now, whenever I sit the palette on a counter top, it doesn't slip. Here's the bright side, the colors are nice and I plan to use it for travel. I only wish that the seller had disclosed this return item prior to my purchase. Lesson learned. In today's bigger picture, let's be thankful we're healthy and have a sunkissed glow thanks to Tarte!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I loved this palette, for me I have very pale skin but both contours shades worked! Don't even get me started on the highlighter😍 It's so pretty and you can really build the color. Overall love this and would make a great gift to you or someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey King

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I didn’t try it yet, but it is authentic. It wasn’t broken, and it was half off other retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Caf211

customer_reviews.title: Yes tarte and Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this Highlight and Contour from tarte. Item arrived quickly, undamaged, and at a better price than makeup competitors.
customer_reviews.author: cds

customer_reviews.title: Amazing palette!
customer_reviews.text: My roommate asked me to order this for her as a trade, and I got one for myself as well. They came separately bubble wrapped, and in perfect condition. I was weary about how well the actual makeup would work because I’ve been stuck in my ways but I’m very impressed with the pigment and quality overall. Not to mention, these were about $45 at Sephora when I ordered them. So this is a great deal, highly recommend anyone into contouring or even just looking for a few awesome highlighters go ahead and get this!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this palate because I saw one of the real housewives using it... and I love it. The highlighter isn’t glittery and the contouring options aren’t orange. That’s hard to find in my experience. I’m dirty blonde and light skinned. With blue eyes. I wear bare minerals powder foundation and this goes on nicely for me! I wear it daily for countouring with the highlighter for special events!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend for light skin, packaging was nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about it coming in broken, but I'm so happy it didn't! Btw I would only recommend this for darker tan/medium skin. In my opinion, the highlight colors are too dark for light skin. But darker skin tones could use every shade in the palette, which is nice since I usually only get to use one or 2! From the pic you can tell I'm a dark medium/ tan skin tone. The packaging was actually pretty secure. The palette was a little dirty from product, but no biggie. I'm so excited to use this and I'm so glad I got it at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product and the seller was so sweet she even ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product and the seller was so sweet she even wrapped the kit in purple wrapping paper and wrote a note which was SO thoughtful and cool. My package came right away and I would totally shop from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Mumy

customer_reviews.title: Double wrapped in bubble wrap!
customer_reviews.text: ~Received my Tarteist PRO Glow pallet today and was a lil scared to open it. After reading several reviews prior to ordering, I was afraid that mine too would arrive broken. It was double wrapped, and absolutely PERFECT! This is my 2nd highlight pallet, and I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.author: isabelle vela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely real, as the scent and quality was just like the one at Sephora. Quality of the highlighters and contour is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Panda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Highlighter Palette!
customer_reviews.text: This palette is beautiful. Inside and out. The colors are amazing! Palette is complete with its range of nice colors and contours. It’s highly pigmented and it’s certainly my go to cheek and highlight palette. People always notice and compliment me when I wear these highlighters.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Love the pallet HATE the shipping
customer_reviews.text: Atleast I could salvage the broken one. But the pallet is so pretty and application is like silk.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I rely like this highlight contour palette. I am able todo so may things with it. The colors are just perfect . They are not cheap. I can put it on in the morning and still have it on all day without falling or touching up.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Severely USED&DAMAGED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this 1 star because I had to otherwise I would give it no stars! Product came a week after it said it would. Worst of all, the pallets container on the outside was covered and I mean covered in dirty finger prints which leads me to believe it was previously used. Also, 2 of the shades inside were crushed and 1 cream shade had a swipe mark dug into it all across it. Not to mention, it was not packaged securely. VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kierstin

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL palette!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous that my palette would arrive cracked like some of the reviews mentioned, but I was pleasantly surprised it came perfectly packaged and without a trace! Was so happy to find this gorgeous palette so much cheaper then Sephora from a licensed seller; can't wait to use it! Would definitely recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: b. rose

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this pallet and one of the highlighters came crushed in top corner it was still usable and not that bad and I'm surprised but kinda disappointed. The highlighters are not a blinding as i would like but if u pair them with fenty highlighters the are absolutely blinging and so pretty. The 2 contour shade are decent one is a cream and one is a powder they are both pigmented and great contour shades.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Stevahn

customer_reviews.title: Very bad
customer_reviews.text: Very poor the pallets is all crack and broke I just can’t refund because I lost the paper
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rose Angulo

customer_reviews.title: SOO WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I have my pallet a little over a year now needless to say I use it everyday and I always get compliments on my highlight its definitely noticeable with the first stroke so you don't need a lot but again I love a good highlighted cheek I would highly recommend although be careful not to drop it because the pallets will break
customer_reviews.author: jpops

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviews have stated here
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews have stated here, DO NOT buy this. 3 of the palettes were broken on arrival. Product covered the outside of the packaging and the compact itself and the broken palettes seemed suspiciously half a** packed back into their slots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite purchase ever ? :)))
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never written a review because I’ve never had a product that I thought was good enough for one. I don’t think I’ve ever been more satisfied with a purchase. It gives you a good variety of highlighting shades along with a blendable cream contour. It also has one shade for powder contour that I believe could go well with MANY skin types/shades. Obsessed with this pallet :))
customer_reviews.author: Keona

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is so good love the smell the variety of highlighters are amazing in different shades. love it love it love it
customer_reviews.author: gabby strother

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed recieved my make up shattered n all over the box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ☺
customer_reviews.text: Not too much color pay off as I expected. For contour beginners is great because the colors are subtle.
customer_reviews.author: zoila juarez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but unfortunately the palette was shipped in too big of a box with no bubble wrap or other support at all and the fire portion of the palette separated and fell out. Now I can't put it in my makeup bag because it'll cause too much of a mess if lifted around and so it's useless for me, as I'm always traveling. More care should be put into the packaging for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Racheal Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. I was nervous due to previous reviews but I scored!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Broke every which way
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived broke and messy. Still works but can't stand the mess!
customer_reviews.author: kaylee townsend

customer_reviews.title: Perfecr
customer_reviews.text: Came perfectly without being broken/cracked/etc. It is a real Tarte palette. 10/10 :)
customer_reviews.author: Becca Tyger

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice, if it wasn’t broken...
customer_reviews.text: Received broken and damaged! My 13 year old was super excited to order this with her Christmas gift card, only to be completely bummed when she opened the package and found a broken up palette☹️
customer_reviews.author: sskfleming

customer_reviews.title: Best. Glow. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten so many compliments on my skin! If you want a healthy glow, this is the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Product was Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Good price, fast shipping, but unfortunately, all of the makeup was smashed and in pieces when I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: John McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful, but arrived with the glass broken, grateful it wasn’t the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Highlight works really well. The contour is a little dark for me but blends out really well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My cousin let me barrow her palette and I loved it I had to get my own it smells amazing and has beautiful tones!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful palette. Even for a beginner that doesn't know ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful palette. Even for a beginner that doesn't know what she's doing, it's easy to use after watching a few youtube videos!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ranta

customer_reviews.title: Love the glow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, worth the price. Definitely recommend it 100 %, it covers very well and makes my make up look flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to give it the benefit of the doubt and I was so happy I did
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I ordered skeptical. But for the price, I wanted to give it the benefit of the doubt and I was so happy I did. It came without any damage and it is the exact product! Not copy or a scam! So so so happy with this :))
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Henken

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product well worth the money, amazing and pigmented highlighters. Packaging and presentation of product really good.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklynn

customer_reviews.title: Most of the makeup was cracked and broken when I received it. Bought it for a gift.
customer_reviews.text: The makeup was cracked and broken. I cannot give this as a gift. Very upset
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Rated the best Christmas present!!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our daughter for Christmas!! It was a hit!!! She loves it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors, blends nicely. Not chunky glitter but good fine shimmer. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Holland

customer_reviews.title: No streaks!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty palette and easy to use. I don’t notice any lines after makeup is rubbed in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this palette
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome palette, beautiful highlights and the both cream contour and powder bronzer are gorgeous and pigmented
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, its beautiful!!! Real deal,full size and perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Horvath1

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to be receiving my tatted palette today but then became very disappointed to find the shadow broken! If I would’ve known better I would’ve bought it in store especially since this was supposed to be a Christmas gift..

customer_reviews.title: love this highlighter
customer_reviews.text: can not go wrong with Tarte products! love this highlighter palette
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Sue

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend buying it to others
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been want King to try this out so I bought it for her! She loves it. Would definitely recommend buying it to others! It was a great price and came fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. There was damage in shipping. Fortunately, it was a highlighter I don't use because it's too dark for my face.
customer_reviews.author: alonzo

customer_reviews.title: The package look very nice and the colors are pretty
customer_reviews.text: The package look very nice and the colors are pretty, but two of the colors are broken. It's definitively a good deal for an authentic product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Zamorano

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot even use half of the palette because it arrived smashed to powder. Definitely a good price, half of what Ulta charges. But when I oredered from Ulta in the past none of the product was damaged so...
customer_reviews.author: Victoria DiPerri

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This highlighter is by far one of my favorites, it came securely wrapped and is 100% authentic. I went online and reviewed prices to find that this is half off other retailers, will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Shurell Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: It came with three shades broken. I know how to fix broken makeup so it wasn't a big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dana wagner

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this package. The makeup had broken and was all over the inside of compact and outside . There is a large fingerprint on the damaged part of the compact .
customer_reviews.author: April Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: The package is beautiful and the contour is flawless. I've tried numerous and this is the best and what I'll stick with.
customer_reviews.author: Codie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I was excited to receive my package! Opened it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive my package! Opened it up to find it all broken up and one pallet not useable!
customer_reviews.author: Cory J Rawson

customer_reviews.title: Love the pallet
customer_reviews.text: The pallet is beautiful but one of the colors crumbled right out. I was so sad to have to return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The makeup broke
customer_reviews.text: I had opened the package and it smelled just like all of the other pallets from Tarte. I had noticed glitterey powder spreaded around the box so I opened it and one of the highlighters were shattered! Very dissapointed. Defiantly returning. :(
customer_reviews.author: morgan showers

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: One of the highlighters is a little broken up, but I love this palette and it’s a good price so I don’t mind.

customer_reviews.title: No damage!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I was concerned about possible damage to this product based on other reviews but mine was double wrapped in bubble wrap and was not damaged.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Came in perfect condition and such a great price!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and heart broken.
customer_reviews.text: My Palette came in completely shattered and ruined. Not only that, it gave me a reaction on my skin that acted like a product that’s expired.

customer_reviews.title: Two shades of the 6 wasted.
customer_reviews.text: When my package got here one of the shades was broken and it was all in the cream contour and all over the rest of the product. Two shades of the 6 wasted.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.text: Love the colors but one of the highlighters must have been broken in the mail.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this package, however it is busted up. I noticed before I even unfolded the pallete that there was makeup on the outside cover. And when I opened it, there is makeup dust everywhere and one piece of the 6 looks like it is about to fall out which means it's extremely dry. I'm not happy with this purchase and I'm not sure what to do about it.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic product, high impact highlighter
customer_reviews.text: Worried it was going to be a knockoff, so I bought the same thing at Sephora to compare. Genuine product (at least my order), and half the price! I'm more tan so the contour doesn't show up as obvious, but good color. Intense highlight, I would use a lighter touch :)
customer_reviews.author: Ricasami

product_meta.title: tarteist PRO glow highlight contour palette
product_meta.description: A highlight and contour palette with six pigmented powder and cream shades to create perfectly glowing, chiseled looks on every skin tone, without the icky, bad stuff.
feature_bullets: A highlight and contour palette with six pigmented powder and cream shades.
It creates a perfect glow and chisel look.

It is ideal for every skin tone,and doesn’t leave an icky, bad stuff. Lit (champagne highlight) Strobe (pearl highlight) Fire (bronze highlight) Stunner (opalescent highlight) Shade (cream contour) Sculpt (powder contour)
